metadata.Title: CVE-2018-7054 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in Irssi before 1.0.7 and 1.1.x before 1.1.1. Thereis a use-after-free when a server is disconnected during netsplits. NOTE:this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-7191.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-7054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

irssi - 1.0.5-1ubuntu4.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: irssi package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.5-1ubuntu4.2').
